Package it.polimi.ingsw.gameZone

package it.polimi.ingsw.gameZone
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    CardMarket
    This class refers to the Card Market where you can buy the devCards.
    CardMarketDeck
    Deck of DevCards of the CardMarket
    GameZone
    GameZone is a container for markets shared between players
    MarbleMarket
    MarbleMarket represents the resources market
  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    InvalidMarbleMarketIndexException
    InvalidMarbleMarketIndexException is thrown when an invalid row or column in the MarbleMarket is trying to get accessed
